text: Christos Theophilou () (born 30 April 1980 in Limassol) is a Cypriot footballer who plays for Aris Limassol as a right defender. ==Career== Theophilou started his career at Apollon's Academy and he has been the captain of Apollon. On 1 June 2010 he signed a 2-year contract with AEK Larnaca. A year later he returned to Apollon. In July 2012, he signed a two year contract with 2011-2012 Champions AEL Limassol. Two years later, he joined Aris Limassol, which competes in Cypriot Second Division, in order to assist the club's return to Cypriot First Division.
